name: Gunning Man
description:
In the future, audience craves something more than just spectacle. People want blood — your blood.

You're a participant at the annual Gunning Man games. Armed only with your own wits and your trusty gun, you must defeat waves after waves of enemies in the hopes of making money for your family.

Pick up and combine microchips with different modifiers to make your gun even more powerful.

A gun whose bullets scatter and ricochet? A spread grenade launcher with piercing shots? You are only limited by your imagination.

Let's see how far it gets you in... the Gunning Man!

Controls:
WASD/arrow keys — move
Left click — shoot
Right click — dodge roll
Open chip editor to place microchips from your inventory (left) onto your weapon grid (right)

Made by a team of two for ScoreSpace Jam #12 (theme: combining)

Music by Eric Matyas
